divs: Sighting Details It's lunch time and I'm going to the bank to cash my check as I get out of the car I began to smoke a cigarette it was a very nice day some small clouds... I was looking at and airplane traveling west when I notice 2 more planes parallel traveling north... then I notice what it look like a star. I'm wondering why I could see a star in the afternoon? As I stared at this object it began to move and it stopped again and it moved again this time it moved into a cloud to its right ( my left ) as it entered the cloud I could tell than it was glowing very bright as it enter the clouds thick part I was not able to see it, I wanted to stay there and wait but being lunch time I had limited time to get back to work.
Summary: I was looking at the planes on a beautful afternoon I notice a bright object stationa.ty then it moved and stoped and moved again and when in the clouds
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Nashua
There were no other sightings in Nashua on or around September 25th 2013
